00001 #include "pgsqlcommon.h"
00002 #include "util.h"
00003 
00004 using namespace std;
00005 
00013 char alias2dom( pqxx::Connection &pg, string &dom ) {
00014     pqxx::NonTransaction ip2dom(pg);
00015     pqxx::Result res(ip2dom.Exec(
00016         "SELECT domain FROM ip2domain WHERE ip="+pqxx::Quote(dom, false)));
00017     if( ! res.empty() ) {
00018             const char * alias = res[0][0].c_str(); 
00019             if(!alias) return 1; // it's empty
00020             dom = alias;
00021             return 0;
00022     }
00023     return 1;
00024 }
